titleStmt.title: The loyal conquest or, Destruction of treason, a song to the tune of, Lay by your pleading, the law ly's a bleeding.
titleStmt.author: Dean, J. (John), fl. 1679-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Dean, 1683. Bookseller in Cranborn-Street in Lescester-Fields; near Newport-House,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
